description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
author: Victor Sergeev
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
Gleb Sukhodolskiy
Timur Zinniatullin
oscd.community
Tim Shelton
frack113 (split)
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
name: CurrentVersion NT Autorun Keys Modification
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Nn][Tt]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\\[Vv][Mm][Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ii][Nn][Ii][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Mm][Aa][Nn].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\\[Gg][Pp][Ee][Xx][Tt][Ee][Nn][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss][Ee][Tt][Uu][Pp].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\\[Aa][Ll][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Aa][Tt][Ee][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ss]\\[Aa][Vv][Aa][Ii][Ll][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ii][Cc][Oo][Nn][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ll][Ii][Bb].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ii][Nn][Ii][Tt]\_[Dd][Ll][Ll][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ii][Mm][Aa][Gg][Ee]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\ [Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Oo][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Oo][Nn][Tt]\ [Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss]32.*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd].*/)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:/\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/) OR ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ii][Mm][Aa][Gg][Ee]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\ [Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Oo][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Cc][Hh][Aa][Ii][Nn][Vv][Aa][Ll][Ii][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Tt][Ii][Gg][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Oo][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]/))) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn][Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ee]\\[Hh][Kk][Ll][Mm]\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Nn][Tt]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ii][Ss][Tt][Rr][Yy]\\[Mm][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ii][Nn][Ee]\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Nn][Tt]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\.*/)) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Gg][Rr][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Gg][Rr][Aa][Tt][Oo][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Gg][Rr][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Gg][Rr][Aa][Tt][Oo][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))) OR ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd]\\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd]\\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\\[Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee][Ss]\\.*/) AND process.executable:/.*\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee][Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\\[Gg][Pp][Ee][Xx][Tt][Ee][Nn][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\\\{827[Dd]319[Ee]\-6[Ee][Aa][Cc]\-11[Dd]2\-[Aa]4[Ee][Aa]\-00[Cc]04[Ff]79[Ff]83[Aa]\}\\[Pp][Rr][Ee][Vv][Ii][Oo][Uu][Ss][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Yy][Aa][Rr][Ee][Aa][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\\[Gg][Pp][Ee][Xx][Tt][Ee][Nn][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\\\{827[Dd]319[Ee]\-6[Ee][Aa][Cc]\-11[Dd]2\-[Aa]4[Ee][Aa]\-00[Cc]04[Ff]79[Ff]83[Aa]\}\\[Mm][Aa][Xx][Nn][Oo][Gg][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Ss][Tt][Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Gg][Ee][Ss][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Vv][Aa][Ll].*/) AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000009\)/ OR /[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]000003[Cc]0\)/))) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]\\[Ff][Rr][Aa][Mm][Ee][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk].*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Nn][Gg][Ee][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR ((process.executable:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Nn][Ee][Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee]\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Nn][Dd][Aa][Ll][Oo][Nn][Ee][Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee][Rr]\\[Oo][Nn][Ee][Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Ee][Tt][Uu][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Oo][Nn][Cc][Ee]\\[Dd][Ee][Ll][Ee][Tt][Ee]\ [Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee][Dd]\ [Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee]\ [Bb][Ii][Nn][Aa][Rr][Yy]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ \/[Qq]\ \/[Cc]\ [Dd][Ee][Ll]\ \/[Qq]\ \"[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Nn][Ee][Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee]\\[Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee]\\[Oo][Nn][Ee][Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Ee][Tt][Uu][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\"/)))))
